DOC.brief_summary: A single-center prospective , open-label , uncontrolled study 10 male female subject , age 18 65 year , desire laser removal tattoo contain black ink .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Tattoo Removal Using Novel Dual-Wavelength , Dual-Pulse Duration Laser
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center prospective , open-label , uncontrolled study 10 male female subject , age 18 65 year , desire laser removal tattoo contain black ink . Subjects receive 5 laser treatment , space 4 6 week apart , follow 3 month post-final treatment . Number laser treatment require shall base upon tattoo response laser irradiation . The Investigator terminate laser treatment upon 100 % clearance tattoo 5 treatment session , event adverse effect require cessation laser treatment .
DOC.criteria: Fitzpatrick Skin Type I VI Target tattoo contain black ink , 1 year old must obtain professional tattoo parlor . Wiling cover tattoo bandage clothing ; and/or limited sun exposure use approve sunscreen SPF 50 high treat area start 2 4 week treatment and/or every day duration study , include followup period . Target tattoo 'home make ' OR obtain amateur artist . Presence double tattoo treatment area presence tribal , scar , highink density , highly colorful single tattoo . Participation clinical trial another device drug within 6 month prior enrollment study . History allergic reaction pigment follow tattooing . History allergy local anesthetic . History malignant tumor target area . History keloid scarring , hypertrophic scar abnormal wound healing . Excessively tanned area treat unable/unlikely refrain tan study . Current smoker history smoking within 6 month study participation .
